item.title: Matte World Digital
item.description:
Matte World Digital

Hugo, The Curious Case of Benjamin Button, The Golden Compass, Titanic, andTerminator II. Our innovative approach to digital design has led to groundbreaking shots in critically acclaimed films such as David Fincher'sZodiac and Martin Scorsese's Casino.

item.title: Five things you need to know about the Samsung Gear VR
item.description:
Five things you need to know about the Samsung Gear VR

Samsung has been working with the biggest name in virtual reality for over two years to bring a little bit of the virtual world to your smartphone, and with the Samsung Gear VR that experience is finally consumer-ready.
